Title: A new direction in a dry district
Publisher: Hebei renmin chubanshe (河北人民出版社)
Notes: In the front of the boat are insecticide sprayers and parts of a water pump. The older peasant holds a map with the title 大队学大寨规划图 (Study Dazhai Brigade planning map), the younger woman has copies of 红旗 (Hongxi - Red Flag) magazine.
